title: Amazon India Seller Opportunity Finder - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Implement category filter and subcategory drill-down navigation for all Amazon.in product categories
acceptanceCriteria: All listed categories are available for filtering
Users can drill down into subcategories
Category hierarchy is navigable in the UI

file_operations.description: Create a category filter component that displays all Amazon.in categories (Electronics, Home & Kitchen, Beauty, Grocery, Fashion, Automotive, Industrial, Toys, Baby, Health, Books, Pet Supplies, Office, Sports, Handmade, Luxury, Emerging categories) with subcategory drill-down functionality. Use the authorization component to ensure users are logged in before viewing categories.
Create a custom hook that manages category state, subcategory navigation, and calls the backend searchProductsByCategory method from the backend interface.
Define TypeScript types for category hierarchy, including all required categories and their subcategories.

requirements.summary: Build advanced filtering UI with all specified filter criteria
acceptanceCriteria: All specified filters are functional and combinable
Filters update product results in real-time
Filter state persists during user session

file_operations.description: Create an advanced filtering component that supports all filter criteria: price range (â‚¹), rating threshold (< 4 stars), review count (< 200), BSR range, monthly revenue range, product weight (lightweight preference), non-branded/private label friendly flag, low FBA seller count, high review growth in last 30 days, and high margin threshold (>30%). Use the AdvancedFilters type from backend interface and call searchProductsByFilters method.
Create a custom hook that manages filter state, combines multiple filters, persists filter state in session storage, and debounces filter changes for performance.

requirements.summary: Create keyword research module UI with search volume, difficulty, CPC, trend graph, and suggestions
acceptanceCriteria: Keyword tool shows all specified metrics
Trend graph displays 12 months of data
Auto-suggest provides relevant long-tail keyword variations

file_operations.description: Create a keyword research component that displays search volume estimate, keyword difficulty score, CPC estimate, 12-month trend graph, long-tail keyword suggestions, and auto-suggest functionality. Use the KeywordResearchRequest type from backend interface.
Create a trend chart component that visualizes 12 months of keyword trend data using Recharts or similar charting library.
Create a custom hook that manages keyword search state, fetches keyword data, and handles auto-suggest queries.

requirements.summary: Build India-specific profit calculator UI with all cost factors and outputs
acceptanceCriteria: Calculator includes all India-specific cost factors
Outputs display net profit, ROI percentage, and break-even ACOS
GST calculations are accurate for Indian tax structure

file_operations.description: Create a profit calculator component that computes Amazon referral fees, FBA fees, GST consideration, shipping cost, packaging cost, and ads budget. Display net profit per unit, ROI percentage, and break-even ACOS. Wire the generated profit-calc-icon.dim_128x128.png image from frontend/public/assets/generated/profit-calc-icon.dim_128x128.png as the calculator icon.
Create utility functions for profit calculations including GST calculations for Indian tax structure, Amazon fee calculations, and ROI computations.

requirements.summary: Create competitor analysis page displaying top 10 sellers with metrics and weakness detection
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a product opens competitor analysis view
Top 10 sellers are ranked and displayed with all metrics
Weakness detection identifies specific competitive gaps

file_operations.description: Create a competitor analysis page that displays top 10 sellers for a selected product showing average price, average rating, average reviews, listing quality score, and weakness detection (poor images, bad keywords, low review count, high price). Wire the generated competitor-icon.dim_128x128.png image from frontend/public/assets/generated/competitor-icon.dim_128x128.png. Use the SellerAnalysisRequest type from backend interface.
Create a competitor card component that displays individual seller metrics and highlights detected weaknesses with visual indicators.
Create a custom hook that fetches and manages competitor analysis data for a selected product.
Add route for /competitor-analysis/:productId to wire the CompetitorAnalysis page into the application router.

requirements.summary: Design modern dashboard UI with dark mode, visualizations, and sortable product lists
acceptanceCriteria: Dark mode toggle is functional throughout the application
Category heatmap visualizes opportunity distribution
All specified chart types render with accurate data
Users can sort by all specified criteria

file_operations.description: Create the main dashboard page featuring category heatmap visualization, opportunity leaderboard, and sortable product lists. Wire the generated hero-dashboard.dim_1920x1080.png image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-dashboard.dim_1920x1080.png as the hero background. Use the authorization component to ensure only authenticated users can access the dashboard.

Create a category heatmap visualization component that shows opportunity distribution across categories. Wire the generated category-heatmap.dim_800x600.png placeholder from frontend/public/assets/generated/category-heatmap.dim_800x600.png.

Create an opportunity leaderboard component that displays top products sorted by opportunity score. Wire the generated opportunity-meter.dim_256x256.png icon from frontend/public/assets/generated/opportunity-meter.dim_256x256.png.
Create sort controls component allowing users to sort products by highest score, highest revenue, lowest competition, and highest growth.
Create a revenue bar chart component for visualizing product revenue data using a charting library.
Create a BSR trend line chart component for visualizing Best Seller Rank trends over time.
Create a review growth graph component for visualizing review count changes over time.
Create a margin breakdown visualization component showing profit margin components.
Create a theme context for managing dark mode state across the application.
Create a dark mode toggle component that switches between light and dark themes.
Add dark mode CSS variables and styling for the entire application using Tailwind's dark mode utilities.
Configure Tailwind dark mode settings to support class-based dark mode switching.
Add route for /dashboard to wire the Dashboard page into the application router and wrap the app with ThemeContext provider.

requirements.summary: Implement seller alerts notification UI for high-opportunity products and market changes
acceptanceCriteria: Alert system monitors all four trigger conditions
Notifications are displayed in the UI
Users can view alert history

file_operations.description: Create an alerts notification component that displays alerts for new high-opportunity products, sudden competition drops, trending keywords, and seasonal spikes. Wire the generated alert-bell.dim_96x96.png icon from frontend/public/assets/generated/alert-bell.dim_96x96.png.
Create an alert history component that displays past alerts with filtering and search capabilities.
Create a custom hook that manages alert state, fetches alerts from user profile alertPreferences, and handles alert acknowledgment.
Integrate the AlertNotifications component into the main layout header to display alert notifications globally.

requirements.summary: Create subscription tier UI with feature gating, CSV export, and saved lists functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Three distinct plan tiers are implemented
Free tier enforces daily search limits
CSV export is available for paid users
Users can save and manage product lists

file_operations.description: Create a subscription tier badge component that displays the user's current plan (Free, Pro, Premium) using the SubscriptionTier type from backend interface.
Create a feature gate component that restricts access to premium features based on user subscription tier.
Create a search limit indicator component that displays remaining daily searches for free tier users.
Create a CSV export component that allows paid users to export product data to CSV format.
Create a saved product lists component that allows users to create, view, and manage saved product lists using the savedProductLists field from UserProfile.
Create a custom hook that manages subscription tier checks, feature access, and search limit tracking.
Create utility functions for generating CSV files from product data.

requirements.summary: Add advanced features UI including AI suggestions, suitability scores, and sourcing hints
acceptanceCriteria: Each product displays AI-generated opportunity explanation
Private label score indicates manufacturing feasibility
Brand domination and saturation warnings appear when relevant
Capital requirements are estimated and displayed

file_operations.description: Create an AI-generated suggestion component that explains why each product is a good opportunity with reasoning and insights.
Create a private label suitability score component that indicates manufacturing feasibility for each product.
Create a market warnings component that displays brand domination detection and saturation warnings when relevant.
Create a capital required estimation component that calculates and displays estimated initial investment needed.

Create an India sourcing suggestions component that provides local manufacturer hints. Wire the generated india-map-icon.dim_128x128.png icon from frontend/public/assets/generated/india-map-icon.dim_128x128.png.

requirements.summary: Design product display card format with all required information fields
acceptanceCriteria: Product cards display all specified information fields
Recommendation indicator uses clear visual distinction
Cards are scannable and organized in a grid or list layout

file_operations.description: Create a product display card component showing Product Name, Category, Price, Estimated Sales, Revenue, Competition Level, Opportunity Score (1-100), Net Margin, Trend Status, and Recommendation indicator (YES/AVOID/MODERATE). Wire the generated rising-star-badge.dim_128x128.png badge from frontend/public/assets/generated/rising-star-badge.dim_128x128.png for rising star products. Use the Product type from backend interface and the blob-storage component to display product images via ExternalBlob.getDirectURL().

Create an opportunity score meter component that visually displays the 1-100 opportunity score with color coding. Wire the generated opportunity-meter.dim_256x256.png icon from frontend/public/assets/generated/opportunity-meter.dim_256x256.png.
Create a recommendation badge component that displays YES/AVOID/MODERATE with distinct visual styling (green/red/yellow).
Create a product grid container component that organizes ProductCard components in a responsive grid layout.

requirements.summary: Optimize frontend for Indian seller needs with GST display and performance optimizations
acceptanceCriteria: GST calculations are integrated throughout pricing logic
Search and filter operations complete in under 3 seconds
Backend architecture supports millions of product records
Algorithms account for India-specific market patterns

file_operations.description: Create utility functions for GST calculations and pricing display following Indian tax structure.
Create formatting utility functions for Indian Rupee currency display, number formatting with Indian numbering system (lakhs/crores), and date formatting.
Create an optimized product search hook with debouncing, caching, and performance optimizations to ensure sub-3-second response times.
Create loading state components with skeleton screens to improve perceived performance during data fetching.
